sentences.en: A typical result of an upper motor neuron lesion is paralysis of voluntary movement.
sentences.cn: 典型的上位运动神经之损伤就会导致随意运动麻痹.

sentences.en: An attack of paralysis seized him.
But on Ashurst there had now come a feeling of paralysis.
sentences.cn: 但这时艾舍斯特却不知道怎么办才好.

sentences.en: But while cut motor nerves can be counted on to cause paralysis, sensory nerves are tricky.
sentences.cn: 然而,虽然可以指望以切断运动神经的方式造成麻痹,但是, 感觉神经却很难控制.

sentences.en: He had been crippled by a rare type of paralysis spreading from his ankle.
sentences.cn: 一种罕见的麻痹症从他的踝部扩散开来,最终道致他的残废.

sentences.en: I crept along , fighting paralysis of the calves and the thighs.
sentences.cn: 我蹑脚蹑手地摸索着走,极力控制着肌肉抽搐的双腿.

sentences.en: Its effects on the nervous system include weakness, paralysis, and tingling in the hands and feet.
sentences.cn: 它对神经系统的影响包括虚弱、麻痹与手脚刺痛。

sentences.en: Melanie seemed in a paralysis of terror and only stared into his face.
sentences.cn: 媚兰好像吓傻了,两眼直直地看着他的脸.

sentences.en: Night Nurses'Paralysis: A New Phenomenon in Clinical Psychology?
sentences.cn: 夜班护士麻痹症状群: 临床心理学的一种新现象?

sentences.en: Only an open - ended and continuously self - critical approach could avoid paralysis in the theory.
sentences.cn: 只有一种无限制的、持续的 自我 批判方法才能避免理论中的瘫痪现象.

sentences.en: Paralysis of the lower limbs condemned him to a wheelchair.
sentences.cn: 下肢瘫痪使他只好坐轮椅.

sentences.en: Poison from the weaver fish causes paralysis, swelling, and nausea.
sentences.cn: 龙的毒素会引起瘫痪、肿胀和恶心。

sentences.en: The accident left him with paralysis of the legs.
The paralysis affects his right leg and he can only walk with difficulty.

sentences.cn: 这种蛇的毒液会引起身体麻痹。

words.tran_cn: 使麻痹；使无力；使失去勇气（paralyze的过去分词）
停顿,停止,停滞,休眠,惰性,迟钝
麻痹,瘫痪,中风,小儿麻痹症

phrases.tran_cn: 驰缓性麻痹；弛缓性瘫痪；松弛性麻痹；软瘫

trans.tran_cn: 麻痹，瘫痪，中风，无能，无气力
trans.tran_en: the loss of the ability to move all or part of your body or feel things in it
